text: <https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/3863/> this one is WIP but needs feedback
guys, as you may know, there is a problem with SBFT tests on ppc64
I tried to reproduce the error and succeeded but it could not find a solution yet
<@U1AU8DRQR>: Does it have something to do with the output that I'm also seeing here? <https://jenkins.hyperledger.org/job/fabric-verify-x86_64/5455/consoleFull>
Questions: (1) Do we have any document on how PBFT in Hyperledger works? (2) If the network has >50 nodes with many transactions, is current implementation good for production? Thank you very much.
<@U2Y2V95D2> hyperledger fabric v0.6 is a pretty faithful implementation of the algoritm described in the PBFT paper by Castro & Liskov
